WorkPlace.Description:
DigiEyeZ blev grundlagt I 2000, baseret på en revolutionerende idé. Vi var nogle af de første pionerer som så og forstod potentialet i håndtering af streamet videomateriale og video-on-demand. Ud af denne forståelse kom overbevisningen om, at de massiver af digitale medier der findes i de fleste moderne organisationer og virksomheders arkiver kan håndteres aktivt – og omformes til bæredygtige konkurrencemæssige fordele.

DigiZuite Media Management holder styr på firmaets digitale assets.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Research and Development is searching for a UX Designer to lift and streamline the experience of our DAM. The UX’er will be an integrated team member on the development team collaborating with graphical designers and front-end developers – but also with business analysts, quality assurance, professional services, and more.

Responsibilities

  • Design the future interaction model for our products in collaboration with graphical designers and developers
  • Conduct testing of the existing UI to assess user experience and ease of use
  • Use the studies and findings to establish the design elements to be included in future releases
  • Build storyboards based on personas to conceptualize designs to accurately communicate to the development team

Qualifications for UX Designer

  • 3-7 years of demonstrated experience in creating and implementing UX design
  • Ability to work effectively in a collaborative environment to create top-performing interfaces for clients
  • Continued education and research into UX trends and current design strategy and technologies
  • Professional written and interpersonal communicating skills in English
  • Account for challenges using problem-solving skills and seek to optimize data for the best possible outcome
  • Experience creating storyboards and personas

Work conditions

  • Permanent position in the Business Experience Team in R&D
  • Competitive salary with pension, health insurance and six weeks of vacation
  • Informal and agile work environment
  • Cool office facilities in central Odense
  • Lunch, fruit, coffee, tea, Friday bar etc.
  • Flexible work environment with focus on life balance and with the possibility of working from home up to three days per week
